summary: Old flames reunite and sparks are reignited at Christmastime in Florida, but the man is already engaged to another woman so a recently retired couple try to intervene with the help of their dogs.
cast: Julie Gonzalo|Kelly Stables|K.C. Clyde|Alley Mills|Bruce Davison|Alexandra Peters|Gattlin Griffith|Donovan Scott|Connor|Elizabeth Schaible
title: El amor de tu vida
